name: Space Tappers
description:
Space Tappers is a shoot'em up game with simple control in retro arcade style that easy to play but hard to master.

Space Tappers is a game about a pilot that lost control with his spaceship while fighting tons of alien spacecraft. So you just can control the spaceship to left and right by tapping/clicking the screen. fight the alien spacecrafts, destroy all bosses, break the highscore, and unlock all spaceships.

Features:
-simple control, you can only control the spaceships to the left and right just by tapping/clicking the screen.
-randomly spawned bosses and enemies, each game session will be different.
-unlockable spaceships, unlock all the 9 spaceships.
-leaderboards, local leaderboards.
-pumping music, pumping and catchy music by Juhani Junkala.

---Credits---

Thanks For Playing!!!
